column5: The apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a colonial style recently renovated building. Located at walking distance from restaurants and bars, art and culture. You can Uber-Lyft with less than 10$ almost anywhere. The apartment is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets). This listing is gay friendly and open to love of all kinds.
column8: Cozy 2 BRs apt in Montrose Historical District
